GMN_CORE_000.title: Unknown Error
GMN_CORE_000.message: We are sorry, but an unknown error has occurred. That is all we know.
GMN_CORE_000.hint: Inspect the origin below the title for more details.

GMN_APP_001.title: Configuration Error
GMN_APP_001.message: The application configuration is invalid or incomplete.
GMN_APP_001.hint: Check the configuration file and ensure all required settings are present.

GMN_APP_002.title: Invalid Input
GMN_APP_002.message: The provided input does not meet the required specifications.
GMN_APP_002.hint: Review the input requirements and provide valid data.

GMN_APP_003.title: Operation Failed
GMN_APP_003.message: The requested operation could not be completed.
GMN_APP_003.hint: Check the operation parameters and try again.

GMN_APP_004.title: Timeout Error
GMN_APP_004.message: The operation exceeded the maximum allowed time.
GMN_APP_004.hint: Try again or increase the timeout duration if configurable.

GMN_APP_005.title: Resource Exhausted
GMN_APP_005.message: A system resource has been exhausted or is unavailable.
GMN_APP_005.hint: Free up resources and try again.

GMN_APP_006.title: Database Error
GMN_APP_006.message: An error occurred while accessing the database.
GMN_APP_006.hint: Verify the database connection and try again.

GMN_APP_007.title: Serialization Error
GMN_APP_007.message: Failed to serialize or deserialize data.
GMN_APP_007.hint: Ensure the data format matches the expected schema.

GMN_APP_008.title: File System Error
GMN_APP_008.message: An error occurred while accessing the file system.
GMN_APP_008.hint: Check file permissions and available disk space.

GMN_CORE_400.title: Bad Request
GMN_CORE_400.message: The request contains invalid parameters or malformed data.
GMN_CORE_400.hint: Verify all required fields are present and correctly formatted.

GMN_CORE_401.title: Unauthorized
GMN_CORE_401.message: Authentication is required but was not provided or is invalid.
GMN_CORE_401.hint: Provide valid credentials or authentication token.

GMN_CORE_403.title: Forbidden
GMN_CORE_403.message: The request is valid but you do not have permission to access this resource.
GMN_CORE_403.hint: Check your access permissions or contact an administrator.

GMN_CORE_404.title: Not Found
GMN_CORE_404.message: The requested resource could not be found.
GMN_CORE_404.hint: Verify the resource identifier and try again.

GMN_CORE_409.title: Conflict
GMN_CORE_409.message: The request conflicts with the current state of the server.
GMN_CORE_409.hint: A resource with this identifier may already exist. Try with a different identifier.

GMN_CORE_422.title: Validation Error
GMN_CORE_422.message: The request is well-formed but contains semantic errors.
GMN_CORE_422.hint: Check the validation error details and correct the data.

GMN_CORE_429.title: Too Many Requests
GMN_CORE_429.message: Too many requests have been sent in a given time period.
GMN_CORE_429.hint: Wait before making additional requests or contact support to increase your rate limit.

GMN_CORE_500.title: Internal Server Error
GMN_CORE_500.message: An unexpected error occurred while processing the request.
GMN_CORE_500.hint: Please try again later. If the problem persists, contact support.

GMN_CORE_501.title: Not Implemented
GMN_CORE_501.message: The requested functionality has not been implemented yet.
GMN_CORE_501.hint: Check the documentation or contact support for more information.

GMN_CORE_502.title: Bad Gateway
GMN_CORE_502.message: An invalid response was received from an upstream server.
GMN_CORE_502.hint: Try again later. If the problem persists, contact support.
